PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2004-07272004-05-21,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActFirst Nations Goods and Services Tax Act
PrecisApproval to enter into a TAX ADMINISTRATION AGREEMENT with any one of eight First Nations pursuant to which the Government of Canada will collect, within the territory of the First Nation, a value-added (ad valorem) tax on goods and services, similar to the federal GST, imposed under a law enacted by the First Nation.
AttachmentsAttachment
